message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $14,000. I believe this product will be highly beneficial for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I'd like to get a good deal on this product.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $11,500 is significantly below its value. I could consider $13,000.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, $13,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $12,500. Can you consider that?
